评论详情: These are probably the best shoes I've ever purchased. I love the wide toe box. It allows my feet to spread out properly without too much extra shoe getting in the way of walking. The canvas on the heel is a little stiff when you first put them on. Hopefully as I wear them more it softens up.
I have another pair and liked them. These are my favorite color. They are wide and flat, very comfortable.)
So super comfortable!!
Can use with toe spacers. Wide toe box perfect for feet that hurt. I love them!

评论概述: Nice wide shoe. Fits and feels great !
评论详情: Nice shoes, at a great price. Sized as burkenstock shoes, feels really nice and made very good !

I bought a pair of these in yellow and love them, so when they were on sale again, I nabbed a black pair of the same size. Both say they are 9W/40, but the black pair are significantly smaller. had to return and order a larger size.
They are so comfy. I have narrow heels, so the laces are important to fit tight enough on my foot. The toe box is so comfortable. They are so cute, too.
I normally wear 8.5 or 9, ordered a 9 but it was too short.

评论概述: Good for a cheap intro barefoot shoe
评论详情: These are definitely noticeably "meh" quality but are great for a low investment way to test a barefoot shoe. I liked them enough that I bought a different style from Whitin and have been happier with the other style's quality and durability.

I work in healthcare and am on my feet all day long.  These barefoot shoes took a few weeks to get used to and my legs and feet hurt but after a few weeks they felt amazing.  I wear them every single day and there is barely any wear or tear on these or another pair i had for over a year.
Been having alot of feet pain but it decreased alot after wearing these for work.
Finally , I found a comfortable pair of shoes to fit my wide feet.

Due to ingrown toenails, I am in significant pain from wearing anything but flip flops. UNTIL NOW! These are incredibly comfortable and don't give me ANY toe pain. I got my usual size, which is now 1/2 a size larger than the shoe size I used to buy (do yo my toes). They are cute ans SO comfortable... just like I was Barefoot, which is really how I prefer to spend my day (barefoot).

Like other reviews say, these are wide in the toe, but that is a good thing! Every other shoe is narrow, if you want a narrow shoe, buy any other shoe and let those of us who need a wide toe box have these! These are wide enough for me to splay my toes and even a little too wide for that, but I don't mind, better slightly too wide than too narrow.
These were recommended by a foot doctor, and they are so comfortable, even after wearing for hours.  They are wide, but that is because of the “barefoot” feel.  Recommend highly!
Absolutely the most comfortable shoes I own! This was my second pair and my husband has some that he loves as well

Whitin shoes are an amazing, affordable, beginner barefoot shoe brand. They're comfortable, and my toes are able to wiggle around in the toe box wonderfully. The soles are thin enough for my feet to feel the ground, but even after a year of use, they're still holding up beautifully. They are also really grippy on hard floor surfaces.  Very happy with this purchase.
Got these to help with some pain that I felt in my feet. I liked it so much that I bought a second pair in white. Ran a bit tight but they just had to be worn out and they were fine.
These shoes are so comfortable and cute! I love them. I normally wear an 81/2 and the 8 fit perfect.

My feet/toes felt so much better with the wide toe.  But inside of shoes is rough & uncomfortable.  I need arch support & cushioning but it's impossible to find inserts for a wide shoe.  I gave up & put a 2/3 arch support insert under the not great insole that came in the shoe but because of the roughness inside shoe & lack of padding I probably will never wear them.  Took so long searching for inserts, too late to return.  Seller needs to add insole with both support & padding so they can be worn as is.Wasted money.

These are both the comfiest and squeakiest shoes I own. 😂 They fit perfectly and feel just as comfortable as going barefoot, which is crazy! I grew up not wearing shoes often so other shoes really pinch and make my feet ache feel tight. I love that the back of the shoe where it usually rubs on your heel isn’t too stiff; I made sure to wear longer socks for the first few weeks of wear now it’s not rubbing and giving blisters like other sneakers this style tend to do! They’re super cute. My only complaint is they squeak REALLY loudly on hard floors. It’s getting better the more I wear the tread out, but a new tread design would be appreciated. But I love these shoes so much and live in them constantly!
They're comfortable and light. Have a nice wide toe box, but it does cause the white pair to look too much like clown shoes.
Great shoes, super cute and comfy

I had a problem with my feet hurting so someone told me to try these.  It took a little to get used to, but once I did my feet felt better.  My legs ached the first couple of days, but I'm on my feet for 9 hours at work and more at home doing chores.I like the quality and how lightweight they are.  They are flexible.
Been wearing these for a few months now and I will never go back to traditional shoes. Love how they fit, love how they look and all.

I ordered 2 pair of these this summer...one white and one light grey...and absolutely LOVED them! They were SO comfortable, lightweight, easy to wash and I wear them almost every day. I decided to order another grey pair as I got a couple burns on one of mine from a campfire. They were not anything like the ones I have previously purchased. They fit different...perfect toe box, but the rest rest of the shoe was wider as well...and the material felt like a very still canvas and wasn't comfortable at all. I ordered a black pair as well and they were made the same way. Not sure why they are different than the first 2 pair I purchased, but I'm returning them both. Very disappointed.
I wore these shoes almost daily for about 5 months before they started coming apart. They were and still are very comfortable and I like them. It’s good for the price, but I wish they lasted longer.

I kept these shoes and have worn them over a month now. I bought white so I could color them myself. They worked great for that. My issue is that while I have wide feet (and a bunion) my feet sort of swim in these from side to side. I added an insole and my feet still slide around. I have found all other canvas shoes too narrow so I was hoping these would be just right. It may be the specific style. Note in the picture that they are pulled tight. I am going to try another Whitin style to see if they have shoes that are a bit more moderate in width or designed so that they can be tightened more easily. Meanwhile, I can wear these standing around, but they aren't good for much walking, with my feet sliding in them. If someone has super super wide feet they might work great!

I like these shoes. They are good for a canvas shoe that gives you more toe space. The canvas is a little stiffer than some canvas shoes I've had and my second toe rubs, so if you have mountain/Greek feet you might want to order a size up from what the guide recommends.
I only wear barefoot shoes. I have wide feet and this is the first time I’ve ever had room for my toes and can wiggle them.  Highly recommend!
Love my new shoes, so light and comfy!  And I think are very attractive!
My doctor recommended a zero drop shoe for my arthritic toe. These work great! Love them.
They look like clown shoes ughhh so disappointing and they are comfortable too which really sucks another pair bites the dust

评论概述: One year later! Still my favorite shoe to wear!
评论详情: Whitin brand was a big surprise for me, I purchased originally a year ago and did not expect much for the price. I am now a devoted customer! They make a good quality product and it held up well to wear, went through many washes, getting wet and muddy in the rain, used as daily shoe as well as running shoe, hiking and camping shoe and anything in between! I even wore them to a party, don't judge me… because any shoes after these feel like feet prisons! I have “Magical shoes” brand for winter with wool insulation, but I prefer Whitin for it’s wide fit, natural water repellency of the canvases and they comfortably fit a woolen sock inside. Also soles on my Whitin black shoes are sturdier and let less cold in when it is cold then magical shoes do! Wow! May be due to difference in the sole material/density? But I paid $200 for the magical shoes 😅…  So final thought, give them a try! I have been telling everyone about these shoes. No more pain in my feet due to the shoes flexibility, weight and zero drop (no arch support) which took time to adjust but it was so worth it!  Also for someone with feet issues, I personally have been diagnosed with plantar fasciitis about two years ago and even slept in a splint! But who knew that instead of immobilizing, actually working on my feet' strength would cure my diagnosis!? Also no more swelling in my ankles and no more soreness and pain in my knees in the morning, which was also issue I had about a year ago.  The color did fade but no complaint there! It was a year of heavy use and fabric is still solid, soles as you can see in the video are a bit but worn, but I think I will be able to wear them for another year at least 👍
I have washed these twice on delicate and they come out nicely. Lightweight, very flexible, and just enough cushioning without not being able to feel the ground

I’ve always liked the name brand canvas shoes - Keds/Converse but can’t wear them due to how stiff and narrow the soles are. These shoes are amazing! I get the look of a Keds shoe with all the barefoot shoe qualities I require. I’ve washed them twice and they’ve retained their shape and color. I exclusively wore these shoes while on vacation. I rode bikes, walked on the beach, walked for miles on all types of terrain and they were extremely comfortable! Buy them!!! They do not disappoint!
They are way too big and way too wide for a “wide” fit.
Interesting!  But even with my socks, way too big in the heels.  I wear this size in Skechers.
I love these shoes. They are so comfortable and cute. Plenty of room for my toes. These are my new favorite shoes. I wear them everyday.
I get sometimes people try on a pair and return but these had visible signs of being worn beyond a try on.
They were absolutely adorable and they held up well.

评论概述: Great wide shoes w/ removable inserts
评论详情: 4.5 stars! I love wearing these shoes. My feet don't hurt and I wear these almost daily. These were perfect when I was switching to a more barefoot lifestyle. If you want less padding you can remove the inserts or you can even add different ones if you want more padding. Better than my $150 barefoot shoes. One negative thing is the canvas does get stained fairly easily.

I love these shoes! They are so comfortable to wear and I still get to feel the ground beneath my feet. After wearing these consistently, my hiking boots are actually very uncomfortable, and they were the most comfortable shoes I had! My feet feel so much better, although my muscles are still getting used to it. Walking around an event for hours certainly gives the legs more of a workout in these than regular shoes. But my feet no longer feel awful after a day of walking!  They are nice and light and I'm very happy with the quality. I will definitely be buying more!
Love the concept of this shoe! However, the toe box and length was too small for me. Ordered a 39 for this shoe. I wear a 8.5 wide for Skechers.
Love these I haven’t been able to find wide shoes that are also nice looking I love these I have wide feet and most shoes don’t fit and hurt my toes.
Overpriced and very cheap.
These shoes are so comfortable and easy to clean. I’ve tossed them in the washer, dried them in the sun (3 times) and they look almost new.

I love these shoes so much I ordered a 2nd pair. When I ordered on 9/30 it said it would be delivered by 10/1 funny thing is once it said my payment went through it changed to 10/2 and now there is a delay. Looking at the same link again if I were to order them it is telling me 10/3 tomorrow for delivery.  A seller should not be putting up false shipping time frames just to make a sale. Other then that these shoes are the BEST, but don't expect them to come anywhere close to when they state they will.

These shoes are plenty wide, thin barefoot shoes, just a tad short for me with the length of my toes... particularly the toe next to my big toe.  That actually is my longest toe and since the rest of the shoe fits great going up a size is kinda out of the question.  They look cute, you don't really notice that they have a wide toe box, but for me they're just a tad short...wish I could give half a star so I could bump my rating up to a 4.5
Very unattractive and sloppy looking. Was looking for a nice “barefoot shoe”. Unfortunately, these were not them. Returned.

Bought them for my mother since she mentioned most shoes now a days tire her feet after prolonged wearing. With these, she says they aren’t as comfortable as ones with memory foam but she has been able to wear them for a long time without getting tired like before!
Very comfortable and holding up well. Only drawback in the squeak they make.
I wanted barefoot shoes for a couple of months, and I'm so pleased with these ones. They're a little big for me since I chose size 39, but I'm actually size 38 in regular shoes.

I bought these shoes primarily so I could cover them in rhinestones for my upcoming Disneyland trip. I couldn’t find a pair of rhinestone barefoot style shoes, so I had to make them myself! I broke these in a little bit prior to covering them in rhinestones (as well as finishing the rhinestone treatment). However, I wore these for 16 hours straight walking 28k steps at Disneyland with NO blisters. They were so comfortable, even with a layer of glue and 20k rhinestones. I would highly recommend these shoes! They are a great classic barefoot style pair of sneakers (I would compare them to a pair of Vans). I would recommend wearing a pair of crew socks to avoid any blisters on the heel. I believe that really helped with the break in.

Fit true to size and very comfortable. It took me a few days to get used to them, and I'm still occasionally surprised when I step on a bigger rock, but overall I really like them. I can easily wear them with or without socks and the made it through the washer without any issue.
I love the tennis.
These are really comfortable and true to size
Just arrived, neatly packaged. Tried them on and they are so comfortable. They look very well made. Will buy these again.

I made the switch to wide toe box barefoot shoes a while back so I had to get rid of ALL of my shoes, including my beloved black vans that I had since middle school. I was so excited when I found these. so many barefoot wide toe shoes just aren't attractive. The styles are getting better as they become more popular, but options have been fairly limited so I was thrilled to see these just looked like the shoes I was used to and loved to wear. I have had them for about a month now and wear them daily. I also wear them to the gym, they make great deadlift and squat shoes. The back of the heel was pretty stiff at first and didn't feel great against my ankle, but they have broken in and that isnt an issue anymore.  I did take out the insoles. They feel a little wider and more barefoot without them in, the insoles dont really have too much thickness or shape to them, but I prefer nothing at all.  I will order these in other colors.
Comfortable, versatile for outfits, easy to clean

Had to get used to having shoes with little to no cushion. But but but wearing them for 3 weeks now and my feet are so happy. I work 60 hr weeks on my feet and I'm so happy I switched to these. I order another pair in a different color.

The only thing I really liked about the shoes with the color. The shoe itself and the material reminded me of the white tennis shoes that you can buy at Walmart. The material does not fit snuggly, although they were the correct size, and has a tendency to fold for the lack of a better word.. The wide toebox is nice but still doesn’t fit very well. The whole shoe just did not fit very well nor look good at all.
I have a wide forefoot and a narrow heel, and this fits great!

I fell in LOVE with the first pair immediately when I tried them on, instant comfort and relief from the white pair I first received. So much so, I  didn’t hesitate to buy them in all black but there is a very distinct difference in the heel of them compared to the white. Not sure if I will keep them, have to try them on again but it was the complete opposite experience where I felt immediate discomfort in the black shoes.

The shoes are from heel to toe box. Shoes sizes are not accurate. I have been since early adult wearing 6.5 -7, sometimes 6 if wide enough. I bought a size 8 extra wide. It fits great! Love the shoes. Measure your foot to cm and see to size guide. Enjoy!

I bought the light grey shoes and was very disappointed in the quality of the canvas material.  They looked dirty after just one wear (to grocery store) and my efforts to lean them were disastrous.  With just using hand soap and water they became very discolored as if I used a bucket of bleach.  I love the feel of the shoes but they are definitely not something I wear in public anymore.

评论概述: Ran small; socks defeat the purpose
评论详情: I had to return my first order because the shoes were too small and I had already ordered a larger size than I usually wear.  Second pair fit well but I discovered I have an issue with barefoot shoes, because they don’t allow your toes to spread out if you don’t like wearing closed shoes without a sock.  I don’t, and the socks confine my toes.  So I either need to get barefoot sandals or give up on this idea.  Since in my climate zone, sandals are a no go for 1/3 of the year, I don’t think this trend is for me.  But these shoes would be okay for people who will go sock less in them.

评论概述: Very uncomfortable inside seams cut feet
评论详情: Unforthunatly had surgery so missed return window. Shoes unwearable due to inside seams rough and blistering. Only put on could not wear
Light weight super comfortable shoes. Cute and good quality. Bought them in white, now they i am getting the black ones too. Love these shoes. Lots of room for my toes.
I got these shoes to help with my feet issues.  It does not help with plantar faciitis.  I bought inserts for them and it's perfect now.  The shoes are adorable.

These shoes are very comfy. Like most people, I've worn shoes with a small toe box all my life. Because of that, I have bunions and they are painful. The toe box on these shoes are wide enough to let my toes move around and I havent had any pain since. I wear low cut toe socks with them so my shoes and feet dont get stinky with no socks. I also love the barefoot style mostly flat, no arch sole. My favorite shoes and the only shoes I will wear now.
Very comfortable. A little bit slippery on wet surfaces

评论概述: Fits goood but fabric is rough
评论详情: Shoe fits good but.. The fabric is very rough and stiff. Wish the fabric was softer.

评论概述: I have them for 14 months now. Love them!
评论详情: Great for casual work days, I take walks with them too (not running! As there’s no cushioning). The usual big toe pain I would get  after walking with regular sneakers went away IMMEDIATELY and my stability improved. I’m super happy with these. I might need to buy new laces because they do wear off with use, but no biggie!

Unless you have a well stocked toolbox, might want to pass! This is the first pair of shoes that I couldn’t get on with shoehorn. I need size 11W shoe, confess that as I worn highheals aka foot killer Once these were on they were likely able to go up stairs without safety stap w/husband + bike helmet I m going to try 11.5 after trying to return
Item arrived on time, my wife seems to be happy with the product
This is wider than the basic whitin, very comfortable, great for someone with a painful bunion like me.  Cute looking with the gum sole, and well made, too
The size is too small and the material isn't stretchy at all. Do not recommend.

I have ordered from this brand, and got the same show size for another pair of zero drop shoes that fit great. They ended up falling apart so I replaced them with these that are too tight on my feet and are painful to wear for too long. Recommend going 1/2 up if possible.

评论概述: Finally a wide toe box shoe
评论详情: I’m pleased with the roomy toe box but it could use some cushioning and arch support.

评论概述: Right shoe slightly different shaped toe box
评论详情: I hate that I can't wear vans anymore. Really never could. These are a cute compromise.  Since I found wide toe box shoes, I can't go back to tapered toe shoes I just wish there were half sizes. My right foot really needs an 8.5. My left foot fits into an 8 just fine.
Love these,they are wide enough for my toes
Well made. They fit well and have a large rounded toe. Very comfortable. Can put them in the washing machine too!
I bought Whitin shoes because I have a bunion on the side of my foot. The front of the shoe is made wide which is what I was looking for. My feet did not hurt and I was very satisfied with the shoe.
I bought these with no expectations, however I was pleasantly surprised. They do not pinch anywhere,they're comfortable, and don't crush my feet.
Pretty good shoes!

评论概述: I will never go back to normal shoes.
评论详情: I love love love these shoes. I wear them to work everyday and they are so comfortable. Me feet and back have never felt better since wearing them.

These are perfect. They don’t look as silly as I was worrying they would for how wide they are. They are super comfortable. I have plenty of room for my toes but they don’t feel floppy or unsecure on my foot. I like that they sort of resemble vans but much more ergonomically shaped. They are thin soled like most barefoot shoes which is a plus or a minus depending on your preference but I actually find my feet get less tired after standing all day than they do in a cheap pair of padded shoes I own.
These shoes have no support
Really love these shoes! So much room for my toes! And so comfy!

评论概述: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned
评论详情: I was having a lot of foot pain due to my vans squishing my toes. And then I learned about wide toe boxes and how other shoes deform your feet. So I began to look at shoes that were cute and look like my vans but still had that wide toe box. I chose these shoes because they were the cheapest. When I first got them, I thought they were too big because there is a lot of room for your toes but after wearing them for a bit, my toes begin to spread out and they just fit perfectly. It doesn’t even feel like you’re wearing shoes! At first, I was concerned about the barefoot, but the zero drop is so comfortable! When I wear other shoes I can tell the difference in my posture and walk. I also feel more connected to the ground without feeling every single rock. The sole is very flexible and and lightweight, so it doesn’t feel like I just have a brick attached to my foot. My only lingering  concern is how long they’re going to last. I have had these shoes for about five months and the souls are starting to wear out. They have also lost some of their color and started to fray a bit at the tip of the toe. However, they are heavily used, due to all my other shoes, feeling incredibly uncomfortable and comparison. I will be buying again and I do recommend the shoes. I think they would last longer if I had other shoes to cycle through. So I will be looking at other shoes from this brand because they’re amazing.
I wear Birkenstocks most of the time, but when I wear "real" shoes these are my go-to. I'm sure I'll have them in every color soon!

I recently found out what wonders barefoot shoes could do for your feet and body but I was struggling to find one decently priced and cute.I ordered these and was pleasantly surprised.They look like keds but are the shape of your feet I love walking in them and think they are adorable, goes with any outfit.
Shoes ripped after wearing only a handful of times

I really like these shoes.  I bought the white pair for summer,  everyday wear.  Walking through dew covered grass (in my white pair) caused a yellowish stain on the material that has never completely come out of it.  I tried stain remover,  dawn dish soap,  and as a last resort was bleach.  Nothing fully removed the stains.  I do still wear them though because they are very comfortable for walking and hiking.  I love the extra wide toe box of the shoe.

评论概述: Lots of room for toes, still not very comfy for longer walks
评论详情: This has a really wide toe box, which is nice, but with my small shoe size it looks proportionally weird. And they're fine for short periods, but not really great when walking a longer distance.
I love this shoe! Perfect for someone who works from home.

I really like these sneakers, I have 1 pair each of the two wide minimal canvas sneakers and both are great!  Can’t beat the price and the color selection.  They are lightweight, wide, flexible and have a barefoot feel after I remove the included insole.

评论概述: Stiff around opening, rubs on ankles
评论详情: Otherwise lovely, wide toe box is comfortable
